description:
Give your data a home with a reassuring cloud in your home

UGREEN NAS is an application that manages UGREEN private cloud storage devices. It provides mass cloud storage, supports multiple devices, and allows you to back up your photos, videos, audios, documents, and more anytime, anywhere. It also offers multiple security protection strategies including RAID1 backup mode, encrypted space, user access permission control, etc. "Your story, I guard."
source: 深圳市绿联科技股份有限公司
